headerDisplay: Use the settings below to configure the Homebridge-SmartShades Plugin. Changes are not applied until you click save at the bottom and restart Homebridge by clicking the power button in the main menu bar. Recommend clicking the "Config" button in the main menu bar to verify all values were entered properly.
footerDisplay: For help please see the plugin [readme](https://github.com/jvmahon/homebridge-smartshades/).

host.description: Enter the IP address of the NEO Smart Shades controller. Find this in the NEO Smart Shades controller application on your phone
host.title: NEO Smart Shades Controller IP.

controllerID.description: NEO Shades Controller ID. Find this in the NEO Smart Shades controller application on your phone. It can be found from the NEO App menu under 'Smart Controllers'
controllerID.title: NEO Shades Controller ID

code.description: Blind or Room Code shown in the NEO Smart Shades Controller App. Code is a numeric string in the form 123.145-78
